A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a fan of Star Wars my whole life (I'm 42 years old).  I tolerated the prequels and still watch them every now and then.  I was excited about Star Wars \"The Force Awakens\"  and looked forward to see the future of my favorite franchise.   BUT what Disney has done in this latest film is completely awful and can never be taken back.  Why in hell would they ruin the original characters of this franchise.   I really don't know what to say expect this is a sad day for Star Wars Fans across the galaxy.
